phrs.translation: 残疾人奥林匹克运动会

sentences.sentence: It hopes that playing football will be part of Paralympic Games.
sentences.translation: 希望踢足球能成为残奥会的一部分。

sentences.sentence: The first Paralympic Games took place in 1948 in London with two British teams competing in an archery competition at that time.
sentences.translation: 第一届残疾人运动会于1948年在伦敦举行，当时有两支英国队伍参与了箭术的比赛。

sentences.sentence: These are the greatest Paralympic Games ever.
sentences.translation: 这是有史以来最伟大的一届残奥会！
